attributes.additional_details: Physical health needs to be maintained and for too long have we allowed tax positive industries to prosper, in tobacco, alcohol, fast food, whilst benefiting the treasury, they contribute to long term illness that puts a strain on an already under-resourced NHS. We raise the cost of alcohol minimum units and sugar rich drinks however, we now penalise regular gym exercise which, coupled with good diet, form the foundation to a healthier United Kingdom.
attributes.background: Allow gyms to re-open with proper cleaning and mask wearing, akin to supermarkets and fast food retailers.

rejection.details:
Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869
